short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use your voice or speech to reply to emails, Slack, Outlook, LinkedIn, etc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DictationDaddy allows you to use your voice/speech to reply to your mails and messages.

We use the latest advancements in the Whisper, GPT, and OpenAI models to make it possible for you to experience the best outcome for converting your voice to text.

Features:

1. Correction using voice:
    - If you made a mistake, you can just say, "change joy to  Joe" using your voice.

2. Punctuations:
    - By default, all the punctuation, etc., are taken care of.

3. Knowledge insertion:
    - You can insert knowledge like a Calendly link, other information, and all those will be automatically inserted in the final output.

4. Emoticons
  - You can just say happy face and a happy face will be inserted.


How it is compared to competitors.

Enhance support for punctuation commands (e.g., period, comma, colon, semicolon).
Consistent capitalization at the beginning of sentences.
Higher voice recognition and accuracy for different accents and languages.
works in 40+ languages like Portuguese, Italiano, Deutsch, Fran√ßais
Ability to add custom vocabulary and nouns for your industry etc.
Good support for homophones.
Works great for all types of accents like Irish, American, UK, Indian, Chinese.
It works everywhere one every websites.
Auto Copy the generated transcript so that you don't have to copy it again.
Works across every browser.
It has effective shortcuts to make your work seamless and can also be enabled via the popups.
It produces 99% accurate transcriptions.
Ability to 

Free to Use for 30 minutes of transcriptions.

Our initial benchmark shows that it performs better to Dictanote, speech to text, speech notes and other speech to text and voice to text extensions available.

DictationDaddy is rated as the best extension for dictation by lots of independent users.

Support
Reach out to us on bansal.rahul14@gmail.com


Improvement And Updates 

1.27
It inserts the text directly into the input field just like DictaNote.


1.21

1. Custom prompts: Now you can add custom prompts to format the output in your own format.
2. Knowledge: You can add relevant links. For example, if you're doing a lot of outreach, you can add links to your presentation or website, and DictationDaddy will automatically add them.
3. Keywords: Certain keywords are hard to understand by transcription tools. With keywords, you can add those keywords, and the transcription tool will transcribe them accurately.

1.16
Improved the onboarding page.
Fix the issue of extensions not working on certain websites.
